description: Selects the memory card slot to record movies.

items.label: Slot 1
items.description: Records movies on the memory card in Slot 1.

items.label: Slot 2
items.description: Records movies on the memory card in Slot 2.

items.label: Simult. Recording
items.description: Simultaneously records movies on the memory cards in Slot 1 and Slot 2.

hint: In the default settings, [Slot 1] is selected.
note: If you want to use one memory card without changing the setting, use Slot 1.
